tonnage.translation[0].definitions[0].de: the size of a ship or the amount of goods it can carry, shown in tonnes
tonnage.translation[0].definitions[1].de: the total number of tonnes that something weighs
tonnage.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: A huge tonnage of bombs has already been dropped on the area.
tonnage.translation[1].definitions[0].de: the total number of tons that something weighs
tonnage.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: The aim is to obtain the maximum saleable tonnage at reasonable cost.
tonnage.translation[1].definitions[1].de: the size of a ship or the amount of goods it can carry, measured in tons
